mapper.sql: SELECT t.copyright_id, t.title, t.introduction, t.start_time, t.end_time, t.certificate, t.cost, t.application_form, t.origin_file, t.agreement, t.invoice, t.item_id, t.state, t.reimbursement, GROUP_CONCAT(m.user_id) userId , GROUP_CONCAT(m.state) userState, i.title AS itemTitle
mapper.select:
FROM t_copyright t LEFT JOIN t_items i on t.item_id = i.items_id LEFT JOIN t_members m ON t.copyright_id = m.task_id LEFT JOIN t_user u ON u.user_id = m.user_id where 1=1
AND title like CONCAT('%',#{copyright.title},'%')
AND state = #{copyright.state}
AND reimbursement =#{copyright.reimbursement}
start_time >= '${item}'
start_time <= '${item}'
end_time >= '${item}'
end_time <= '${item}'
AND (select GROUP_CONCAT(u1.full_name) from t_user u1 LEFT JOIN t_members m1 on u1.user_id = m1.user_id where m1.task_id = t.copyright_id) like CONCAT('%',#{copyright.fullName},'%')
AND (select full_name from t_user u1 LEFT JOIN t_members m1 on u1.user_id = m1.user_id where m1.task_id = t.copyright_id and m1.state = 1) like CONCAT('%',#{copyright.chargeFullName},'%')
AND (select full_name from t_user u1 LEFT JOIN t_members m1 on u1.user_id = m1.user_id where m1.task_id = t.copyright_id and m1.state = 3) like CONCAT('%',#{copyright.teacherFullName},'%')
GROUP BY t.copyright_id
